description:
Deerling is known as the Seasonal Pok√©mon. Depending on the temperature, moisture, and season its color will change.It is pink in the spring, green in the summer, orange in autumn, and brown in winter.
Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava stated that while Deerling wouldn`t be a good fighter, they still want one, because it is so adorable.
name: Shikijika
